name: Mac OSX Tip: Hotkey To Hide/Show the Dock
content:
While mashing the keyboard (as I often do when debuggin poorly written outsourced code), I stumbled upon a very useful OSX hotkey. ## âŒ˜-option-d This command will cause the Dock to go in and out of auto-hide mode. Not the most useful, but very helpful to geeks like me who rearrange their desktop every day.

title: Mac OSX Tip: Hotkey To Hide/Show the Dock
